comments:

The problem is caused by a refactoring participant contributed by Debugger. 
Moving to debugger.

Fixed.
The code was no managing the fact that some Java breakpoint doesn't have the
extra Java model information.
Two 'easy' way to reproduce the problem : add a JSP breakpoint (require the
javafamily example plugin), add a breakpoint in an external Java file (require
the fix for bug 63256).

Changes in JavaBreakpointTypeChange.
